content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason we did not agree on a final price was that the potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, was offering a price that I considered too low for the prime location of the apartment. I believe the location of my apartment is prime and deserves a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as a 7. There was a clear disagreement on the price, but the conversation was respectful and professional.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [response] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
